name: Shadow Sneak
description: You extend your shadow to strike a creature from behind. As a bonus action, you can control your shadow to make a melee attack roll against a target within range, dealing 1d4 ghost damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d10 at level 10, and 1d12 at level 17.

contest.effect: Causes the user to move earlier on the next turn.
